content:
I do not have up-to-date information on the 2020 or forthcoming events. therefore, i can only provide information regarding the 2015 pan american games. 

the number of individual events in gymnastics at the 2015 pan american games was the same as the previous edition held in 2011. gymnastics events in both editions included artistic gymnastics for both men and women, rhythmic gymnastics for women, and trampoline for both men and women. each event had individual competitions, as well as team competitions.
